mapper.select: select from message where id = #{id} and status != 2
select from message where message_type = #{type} and entity_id = #{entityId} and status != 2 order by create_time limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from message where entity_id = #{entityId} and status != 2
select from message where to_id = #{toId} and message_type = #{messageType} order by create_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into message(from_id, to_id, content, status, create_time, message_type, entity_id) values (#{fromId},#{toId},#{content},#{status},#{createTime},#{messageType},#{entityId})
